keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: The best and most popular Indian dish to be made using paneer.

method.text: Melt the ghee or butter in a saucepan. Fry the diced paneer for 3-5 min until golden. Remove from pan. Keep warm.
Add the onion to the pan with the garlic, tomato and spices. Fry for 3-4 min until soft and golden. Set aside with the paneer.
Add the water and peas to the pan. Cover and cook for 3 min until peas are cooked. Drain thoroughly.
Return all ingredients. to the pan with the peas. Mix thoroughly. Heat through for 2 min. Serve.

title: Matar paneer (Peas with cream cheese)
